result.eng: The editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.

result.html: Beidh an t-eagarthóir ag freastal ar chomhdháil san Iodáil an tseachtain seo chugainnThe editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.

result.eng: We'll have a party next week.

result.orig: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn

result.eng: The course will be continued in the next semester.

result.eng: I live in New Jersey next to New York.

result.eng: Until next week, good-bye and God bless.

result.eng: The next morning Jamie was his old self again.

result.eng: They grew up next door to each other.
